title: Silent Harbour
backstory:
Late at night, a shipping container worth millions disappears from Bergen Harbor under mysterious circumstances. A figure is spotted on security footage carrying a heavy duffel bag, and a Swedish executive goes missing. The fog that night was unusually thick and unnatural.

We're stuck. The police investigators need your help to piece together what happened, identify the perpetrator, and recover the stolen goods.
summary: A high-value cargo theft during unusual fog conditions at Bergen Harbor.

suspects.name: Erik Nordstr√∂m
suspects.role: Swedish executive, former Scandinavian Maritime Ltd
suspects.notes: Fired 6 months ago for cargo documentation irregularities. Known to frequent the harbor.

suspects.name: Lina Haugen
suspects.notes: 8 years employment. Recently showed unauthorized access to restricted areas. Mysterious financial deposit after incident.

suspects.name: Henrik Larsen
suspects.notes: 30 years experience. Claims visibility was impossibly poor. Container vanished without trace.
